definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead

sentences.english: A new kind oil-soluble ink-jet printer ink was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种新型油溶性喷墨打印机墨水。

sentences.english: The pins strike an inked ribbon and create an image on paper.
sentences.chinese: 这些针击打喷墨的色带并在纸上产生图像。

sentences.english: Research on Aqueous Dye-Based Ink for Color Ink-Jet;
sentences.chinese: 不要使用激光打印机和颜料墨水的喷墨打印机操作。

sentences.english: This includes most laser, dot-matrix, ink-jet, and Postscript printers.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括激光，点矩阵，喷墨打印。

sentences.english: Wehave only ink jet for color print.
Both inkjet and dry toner print processes will be used.
sentences.chinese: 喷墨和干色剂印刷工艺都会被使用。

sentences.english: It is more economical to print via digital printing machine using ink-jet, or electrostatic principle.
sentences.chinese: 例如用喷墨原理者或静电原理者施印，则效益效高。

sentences.english: It is one of the best colour ink jet paper in the world.
sentences.chinese: 是目前世界最好的彩色喷墨打印纸之一。

sentences.english: Stylus printers and ink jet printers are low-value non-durable equipment.
sentences.chinese: 一般针式打印机和喷墨打印机属低值易耗品。

sentences.english: This is a cheaper technology than piezo DOD inkjet but it is not as flexible.
sentences.chinese: 它比压电按需喷墨技术的成本低，但灵活性稍差。

sentences.english: A method for the determination of phenol in printing ink by brominating derivatization and gas chromatography is described.
sentences.chinese: 建立了溴化衍生测定喷墨打印墨水中苯酚的方法。

sentences.english: The albedo high coating is exquisite, is suitable each kind of ink-jet printer.
sentences.chinese: 白度高涂层细腻，适用各类喷墨打印机。

sentences.english: Division I is a professional production and processing of color inkjet printing paper manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 我司是一家专业生产和加工彩色喷墨打印纸的厂家。

sentences.english: A silver-organic ink has been synthesised for use in a drop on-demand ink-jet printer.
sentences.chinese: 一种有机银墨水已经被合成用于按需喷墨打印。

sentences.english: Cartridge, ink-jet recording apparatus, ink-feeding system and method.
sentences.chinese: 墨盒，喷墨记录设备，供墨系统及方法。

sentences.english: The effect of acid-activated bentonite on the properties of color ink-jet printing paper was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酸化膨润土对彩色喷墨打印纸性能的影响。

definition: color printing/abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]
color printing using several overlaid images
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
